about_the_game:
Forget about your age, get childish and play two-player games till your hands start burning!
Download Red Hands – 2-Player Game and get ready for some hands slaps! And it's not only for fun! The game tests your reflexes and speed too, so if you don't pay attention, you'll get hot hands!
If you like to play two player games, this is a perfect choice for you! This time you have a choice to play with a joystick, too! Red Hands – 2-Player Game is based on a cool two player game known as “hot hands”, “slaps”, "tap hands", "dual hands" or “slap jack”. It's a fun game for people of all ages who like to play competitive games.

GAME FEATURES:
- 2 player game
- you can play with a joystick
- choose from a variety of hands

How to play:
✋ There is a player on each side of the screen
✋ Once the game starts, one player is the attacker and the other is the defender
✋ The attacker slaps by clicking once and the defender retreats by clicking at the right time
✋ If the defender pull out three times, there will be a free hit granted
✋ The winner is the one who first reach 10 points

While playing the game, you can choose different hands. Feel what an animal slaps like, or a skeleton. Want your opponent's hands to get even hotter? Choose the mighty Hulk's hand. Like body art? Choose a tattooed hand.
Challenge your friends to play this fun 2-player game and check who's the first one to get hot hands! Ready? Get set! Go!!
